attributes.action: Stop 'ripping out' our childrens parks in kirlees and calderdale
attributes.additional_details:
Article in the Examiner live
 The areas we are losing 137 of our childrens parks.
Almondbury, Ashbrow, Batley E & W, Birstall & Birkenshaw, Cleckheaton, Colne valley, Dalton, Denby dale, Dewsbury S,E&W, Golcar,Greenhead, Heckmondwike, liversedge, Gomersal, Holme valley S & N, Kirkburton, lindley, Mirfield and Newsome.
attributes.background: Our Kirklees and Calderdale council are wanting to 'rip out' 137 of our chldrens parks, our Councillors say our children are obese due to video gaming but plan to take away the things they go play out for. Save our Parks!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local parks are the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
